App.logic

Class GroupInteraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • App.logic.GroupInteraction

  • public class GroupInteraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods that interact with the group object. Created by Robbe De Geyndt on 14/12/2016.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GroupInteraction(java.lang.String username)
      Constructor uses username of logged in user.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Wrapper addStudents(java.lang.String students, java.lang.String groupId)
      Allows a teacher to add users to a group.
      Wrapper createGroup(java.lang.String input)
      Allows a teacher to create a group.
      Wrapper getStudents(java.lang.String groupId)
      Returns all users that are a member from a certain group.
      Wrapper getTests(java.lang.String groupId)
      Allows users to get a list of all tests that have been published in a certain group.
      Wrapper publishTest(java.lang.String testId, java.lang.String groupId)
      Allows teacher to publish a created test to the students of a certain group.
      Wrapper testResults(java.lang.String testId, java.lang.String groupId)
      Allows teacher to get scores of all students in a certain group on a certain test.
